oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Facile s-monodemethylation of 3,4,5-tris(methylthio)-1,2-dithiolium iodide - synthesis of a highly functionalized tetrathiacyclodecane
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, JD
SINGH, HB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: complexes
metal
dmit
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reduction of 3,4,5-tris(methylthio)-1,2-dithiolium iodide (1) with sodium borohydride followed by oxidative work-up affords an isomeric mixture of the novel macrocycles 4,5,9,10-tetrakis(methylthio)-1,2,6,7-tetrathiacyclodeca-4,9-diene-3,8-dithione (6a) and 4,5,8,9-tetrakis(methylthio)-1,2,6,7-tetrathiacyclodeca-4,8-diene-3,10-dithione (6b).
